info.name: Gallery+
info.description:
Picture gallery for ownCloud which includes preview for all media types supported by the system.
Features:
- Large, zoomable previews.
- Image download straight from the slideshow or the gallery.
- Seamlessly jump between the gallery and the files view
- Ignore folders containing a '.nomedia' file
- Sort images by name or date
- Per album description and copyright statement
Provides a dedicated view of all images in a grid, adds image viewing capabilities to the files app and adds a gallery view to public links.
info.author: Olivier Paroz, Robin Appelman
